attributes.action: make it a criminal offence to demand money with menaces to remove a wheel clamp
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that no private individual or company has any right to interfear with a motor vehicle by fitting a wheel clamp and then demand extortionate amounts of money to remove it. The removal of a vehicle to a compound by a private individual/company should considered as theft. This extortion "racket" must be ended.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
